name: Aaditya Kulkarni
bio: I am a Full stack web developer. I've written code in Java professionally, as well as use it for open source contribution.

name: Adrian Spanu
bio: I work as a software engineer full time. I've been working in Java codebases for a number of years now and I really like the flexibility and usefulness of Java. I'm happy to help new coders discover the awesomeness of Java. Yes, it does exist :).

name: Alban Dericbourg
bio: Software engineer for 10 years now, mostly experienced on the JVM (Java and Scala) for web facing systems. Eager to learn, you'll probably find me trying new things on the other tracks!

name: Andrea Gazzarini
bio: Curious software engineer with more than 15 years of experience, mainly focused on the Java language and IR/Search technologies.

name: Abdul Wahab
bio: Software developer versed in Java & Spring Boot looking to teach others and also learn from them

name: Alex Jablonski
bio: I work as a software developer for a tech consulting company. No matter what language I'm working in, there's always a soft spot in my heart for Java.

name: Arijit Datta
bio: I have been working in Java for the last 13 years at a software major. Beside my everyday work, I am also responsible for teaching Java (Core and J2EE) to new joinees.

name: Alicja Sanestrzik
bio: I am programming in Java professionally for 6+ years. I love to share my knowledge with others, because I think that helping somebody to understand something is the best way to learn.
